DESC.PARA: This function returns a model parameter when given the name of a model parameter. The variable returned gives access to all information about a model parameter, and allows attributes of the parameter to be changed. (These attributes include name, value, minimum, maximum and units.)
This function returns a variable that gives access to all the attributes of a parameter. The argument given is the name of the parameter.
